movie.title: Ballerina
movie.description: Taking place during the events of John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum, Eve Macarro begins her training in the assassin traditions of the Ruska Roma.

movie.title: Almost Cops
movie.description: When an overeager community officer and a reckless ex-detective are forced to team up, plenty of chaos ensues on the streets of Rotterdam.

movie.title: Dangerous Animals
movie.description: A savvy and free-spirited surfer is abducted by a shark-obsessed serial killer. Held captive on his boat, she must figure out how to escape before he carries out a ritualistic feeding to the sharks below.

movie.title: 28 Years Later
movie.description: Twenty-eight years since the rage virus escaped a biological weapons laboratory, now quarantined, some survive. One man journeys into the mainland and discovers terrifying new threats.

movie.title: The Old Guard 2
movie.description: Andy and her team of immortal warriors fight with renewed purpose as they face a powerful new foe threatening their mission to protect humanity.

movie.title: Heads of State
movie.description: The UK Prime Minister and US President are forced to ally after becoming targets of a powerful enemy, embarking on a wild international chase.

movie.title: F1
movie.description: Racing legend Sonny Hayes comes out of retirement to lead a struggling Formula 1 team and mentor a young driver.

movie.title: Saiyaara
movie.description: Two artistic souls find harmony through music despite their contrasting worlds. Their love faces tests of age and fate.

movie.title: Materialists
movie.description: A young NYC matchmaker finds herself torn between a perfect match and her messy ex.

movie.title: Saint Clare
movie.description: A woman is haunted by voices and driven to assassinate bad people — but one murder leads her into a web of corruption and spirits.

movie.title: The Fantastic 4: First Steps
movie.description: Marvel's First Family must defend Earth from Galactus while maintaining their family bond in a retro-futuristic 1960s world.

movie.title: Happy Gilmore 2
movie.description: Happy Gilmore returns to the golf course years after retirement to support his daughter's dreams, facing new rivals and old challenges.

movie.title: Bride Hard
movie.description: A secret agent fights to save a wedding party from mercenaries while trying to keep her identity secret and avoid ruining the ceremony.

movie.title: Superman
movie.description: Superman, a journalist in Metropolis, embarks on a journey to reconcile his Kryptonian heritage with his human upbringing as Clark Kent.

movie.title: Ice Road: Vengeance
movie.description: Ice road trucker Mike McCann must save a busload of tourists after a mercenary ambush in the Nepalese mountains.

movie.title: Karate Kid: Legends
movie.description: Kung fu prodigy Li Fong must adapt to a new life in New York and train with Daniel LaRusso to blend karate and kung fu for a final showdown.

movie.title: Jurassic World Rebirth
movie.description: A covert mission to retrieve dinosaur DNA becomes a fight for survival on a deadly island full of genetic secrets.

movie.title: How to Train Your Dragon
movie.description: Viking Hiccup forms a secret bond with a dragon, challenging the tradition of dragon hunting on the isle of Berk.

movie.title: Demon Slayer: Infinity Castle
movie.description: Tanjiro and the Hashira fall into the Infinity Castle, the demon stronghold, for the ultimate battle against Muzan Kibutsuji.

movie.title: M3GAN 2.0
movie.description: When her AI tech is militarized, Gemma resurrects M3GAN to stop a new robotic threat before it becomes unstoppable.
